name: Loach Dive
description:
Loach Dive

Control your Pond Loach and dive deep into the depths of the ocean to defeat the Anglerfish. Catch tadpoles, clownfish, and eels, but don't touch the jellyfish.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48

NOTE: Use the Desktop version for the best experience, the audio is glitchy on the HTML5 version.

ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK CREDITS:

icebit - Main Theme

Michaelhead - Jellyfish Theme

LaBordone - Angler Theme

Pondylus - End Theme
